cast.name: 马修斯·纳克加勒 Matheus Nachtergaele

writer.name: Luis Fernando Verissimo Luis Fernando Verissimo

introduction: None of them could resist. Over the years, the monthly meetings of the Stew Club – a fraternity that has gathered seven long-time friends for decades – has gone from rituals of power to melancholic failure assemblies. The end would be its only worthy fate. Until a mysterious cook appears, and starts serving them magnificent feasts. The bonds of friendship are back, gluttony as a celebration of life. But there is a catch: after each dinner, a member of the brotherhood is found dead the next morning. What is the real reason for the deaths? And, above all, why do these men keep returning to dinner?
